mapper.sql: pay_merchant_order_id, pay_merchant_order_code, pay_merchant_order_user_id, pay_merchant_order_origin, pay_merchant_order_price, pay_merchant_order_total_price, pay_merchant_order_status, pay_merchant_order_trade_type, pay_merchant_code, pay_merchant_order_remark, pay_merchant_order_product_name, pay_merchant_order_product_code, pay_merchant_coupon_code, pay_merchant_order_wallet, pay_merchant_order_browser, pay_merchant_order_browser_system, pay_merchant_order_version, pay_merchant_order_fail_message, pay_merchant_order_attach, pay_merchant_order_transaction_id, pay_merchant_order_refund_reason, pay_merchant_order_refund_transaction_id, pay_merchant_order_refund_code, pay_merchant_order_refund_create_time, pay_merchant_order_refund_success_time, pay_merchant_order_refund_user_received_account, create_name, create_by, create_time, update_time, update_name, update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT pay_merchant_order_id, pay_merchant_order_code, pay_merchant_order_user_id, pay_merchant_order_origin, pay_merchant_order_price, pay_merchant_order_total_price, pay_merchant_order_status, pay_merchant_order_trade_type, pmo.pay_merchant_code, pm.pay_merchant_name payMerchantName, pay_merchant_order_remark, pay_merchant_order_product_name, pay_merchant_order_product_code, pay_merchant_coupon_code, pay_merchant_order_wallet, pay_merchant_order_browser, pay_merchant_order_browser_system, pay_merchant_order_fail_message, pay_merchant_order_attach, pay_merchant_order_transaction_id, pay_merchant_order_refund_reason, pay_merchant_order_refund_transaction_id, pay_merchant_order_refund_code, pay_merchant_order_refund_create_time, pay_merchant_order_refund_success_time, pay_merchant_order_refund_user_received_account, pmo.create_name, pmo.create_by, pmo.create_time FROM pay_merchant_order pmo INNER JOIN pay_merchant pm ON pm.pay_merchant_code = pmo.pay_merchant_code WHERE pmo.pay_merchant_code = #{request.payMerchantCode} AND pay_merchant_order_status = 1000
AND pmo.pay_merchant_order_user_id = #{request.userId}
AND (pmo.create_time >= #{request.startTime} AND pmo.create_time <= #{request.endTime})
ORDER BY pmo.create_time DESC
